channel.title: Basic subtractive synth - core elements
channel.description: After working through the tutorials and reading the [Axoloti book](http://community.axoloti.com/t/getting-started-with-axoloti-the-book/122/3) @janvantomme I came up with my first synth. It's architecture is quite basic and loosely based on the TB303 and sounds familiar. My main goals in creating this synth were to get a better understanding of the Axoloti an how to create some functions elementary to subtractive synths. The following features are included: - mixing OSC-waveforms - modulating a filter with an envelope with varying amount - filter key tracking with amount - Legato glide with glide time control - Pitchbend with range control - applying several modulation sources to one modulation target (PB+glide->OSC-Pitch and Env-Amount+Key-Track-Amount->Filter-Pitch) - two switchable "Amp"-Channels: clean and distortion - mapping Midi CC#01 (Mod-Wheel) to the envelope amount control to the filter Maybe this patch is interesting to other new Axoloti users...so I am happy to share it. :slight_smile: Ting-Bassline-mono.axp (7.8 KB)

item.title: Basic subtractive synth - core elements
item.dc:creator: @ting Torben Fiedler
item.description:
@ting wrote:

After working through the tutorials and reading the Axoloti book @janvantomme I came up with my first synth.

It's architecture is quite basic and loosely based on the TB303 and sounds familiar.

My main goals in creating this synth were to get a better understanding of the Axoloti an how to create some functions elementary to subtractive synths.

The following features are included:

  • mixing OSC-waveforms
  • modulating a filter with an envelope with varying amount
  • filter key tracking with amount
  • Legato glide with glide time control
  • Pitchbend with range control
  • applying several modulation sources to one modulation target (PB+glide->OSC-Pitch and Env-Amount+Key-Track-Amount->Filter-Pitch)
  • two switchable "Amp"-Channels: clean and distortion
  • mapping Midi CC#01 (Mod-Wheel) to the envelope amount control to the filter

Maybe this patch is interesting to other new Axoloti users...so I am happy to share it.

Ting-Bassline-mono.axp (7.8 KB)

Ting-Bassline-mono.JPG1673x661 98.2 KB

Read full topic
